title: Where is Bard and when is he coming back?
body: I know there was a bug, but are other things being done to change {{champion:432}} skills?  The {{champion:101}}  bug was fixed within hours.  Were goin on 2 days now.  I really love playing this champ. What is his status??  Im worried about him.   ;)

replies.body: We've got a fix in testing at the moment for a bug where a Bard ult at particular time would leave towers permanently untargetable. Can't offer an ETA for that fix going out, depends on how that testing goes. Lot of focus on getting him fixed and re-enabled though.

I understand the difficulty in patching this particular error, but couldn't a temporary fix be implemented, instead of removing him altogether? Like, removing towers from the pool of units effected by his Ult until a proper code fix can be implemented
So, how is the testing going? Do you guys think you fixed it? It's been over 2 days now.

So how is the fixing progressing?
- The one bard main desperate to get him back

The Bard bug is pretty powerful and coding extensive, so it might be a while before he returns to runeterra.

Essentially a bard with proper timing was able to freeze inner turrets as the outer turrets were destroyed, which caused the inner turrets to be intargetable by players.

I don't know how Riot codes their games, but just from my knowledge of game design, fixing this problem would require them to either entirely recode Bard's Ult's affect on turrets, something that could take a few days, or completely recode how turrets go from being intargetable to targetable, something that could also take a few days.

The complication is that you want the turret to become intargetable after the outer turret is destroyed but also after bard's ult expires.

it will likely be a little while before the bug is fixed, however I don't think they will be doing any hard changes to his kit, as those would likely go through the PBE first rather than just be tossed into a hotfix. Presently there is already a large number of number changes to Bard on the PBE, so we can expect him to be a little to a lot stronger on the next patch.

...isn't it funny that Bard the helper of the good is causing so much rethinking..
it's like the a little fairy which told you not to code without a proper concept...and now u have to deal with the mess she predicted... XD {{champion:432}}

*edit
and like in the animation he comes and goes ...lol
The service announcement about bard being disabled seems to be gone.  Assuming it's fixed now.

A bug isn't a singular, nebulous concept. There isn't just a cockroach sitting in the code somewhere. Some bugs are minor issues, like a particle not aligning correctly. Some bugs are moments of "Wait, now a thing's indestructible forever."
